414840.name: Robotpencil Presents: Lighting Tools and Tips
414840.description:
Lighting Tools and Tips - Series

Video 1


  • Demonstrating the tools and how they can increase workflow
  • Explaining basic understanding of light to start to make your character 3D feeling
  • Using the tools to get a good Ambient Occlusion to your characters, nondestructive

Video 2


  • Using overlays to build skin tones.
  • Applying strategic coloring to increase vibrance
  • Use of accidents to enhance your painting.

Video 3


  • Gradient Maps
  • Action
  • RGB, Color Mixer Brush

英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
